alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 7:00AM CDT until July 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR ROCK ISLAND...EASTERN CEDAR...SCOTT...EASTERN MUSCATINE AND SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 700 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lowden to near Illinois City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Muscatine, East Moline, Tipton, Durant, Silvis, Eldridge, DeWitt, Milan, Coal Valley, Wilton, Hampton, Walcott, Blue Grass, Buffalo, Andalusia and Long Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
